

 ```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
.doc_arg(
    type = "character",
    description =
        c(
            "Name of the",
            .doc_r6class(suffix = ""),
            "to be defined.",
            "See also the documentation of argument",
            .doc_ref(tag = "classname", topic = "R6Class", namespace = "R6", text = "\\code{classname}", , code = FALSE, prefix = "'", suffix = "'"),
            "in",
            .doc_ref_help(topic = "r6class"),
            "."
        )
)
 ```
